abstract: The delegate for renaming the navigation item.

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency weak var renameDelegate: (any UINavigationItemRenameDelegate)? { get set }

overview:
## Discussion

If you assign a non-`nil` value to this property, UIKit shows an inline text field UI for changing the navigation item’s title. This UI appears when either you or the system calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/rename(_:)] on the navigation controller, which occurs when a person taps Rename in the title menu or when you call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/rename(_:)] explicitly.

To show Rename in the navigation item’s title menu, include the Rename menu element in the menu you return from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/titleMenuProvider]. UIKit includes Rename in the set of menu element suggestions it passes in to this closure.

If you only want to show Rename in the title menu, assign a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/renameDelegate-8jiuf] without setting a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/titleMenuProvider]. In this case, UIKit automatically generates a title menu containing the Rename menu element only.

If you set this property to `nil` while a rename operation is in progress, the operation cancels immediately.

# renameDelegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for renaming the navigation item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency weak var renameDelegate: (any UINavigationItemRenameDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you assign a non-`nil` value to this property, UIKit shows an inline text field UI for changing the navigation item’s title. This UI appears when either you or the system calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/rename(_:)] on the navigation controller, which occurs when a person taps Rename in the title menu or when you call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/rename(_:)] explicitly.

To show Rename in the navigation item’s title menu, include the Rename menu element in the menu you return from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/titleMenuProvider]. UIKit includes Rename in the set of menu element suggestions it passes in to this closure.

If you only want to show Rename in the title menu, assign a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/renameDelegate-8jiuf] without setting a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/titleMenuProvider]. In this case, UIKit automatically generates a title menu containing the Rename menu element only.

If you set this property to `nil` while a rename operation is in progress, the operation cancels immediately.

## Renaming documents

- **UINavigationItemRenameDelegate**: Methods an object implements to rename a navigation item.
